name: root
description: Secure boilerplate for Electron app based on Vite

scripts.compile: npm run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.mjs
scripts.init: npm run create-renderer && npm run integrate-renderer && npm install
scripts.rebuild: cd node_modules/better-sqlite3 && npx node-gyp rebuild --target=38.1.2 --arch=arm64 --dist-url=https://www.electronjs.org/headers && cd ../usb && npx node-gyp rebuild --target=38.1.2 --arch=arm64 --dist-url=https://www.electronjs.org/headers
